title.narrative: IN-0000199 Sterschool Boudh District

description.narrative:
General objective: Ensure access to relevant quality primary education integrating comprehensive sexual education to 3000 marginalized 6-14 years children in 50 primary schools in Boudh district of Odisha.
Project will be implemented in 50 government primary and upper primary schools of Boudh block of Boudh districts, Odisha.
Due to higher fundraising and extra initiatives on training CSE and STAR-BEQUIP budget 2017 is topped up with € 8.578 to 50K

sector.narrative: Basic life skills for youth and adults

title.narrative: All reached children, irrespective of gender, sustainably demonstrate the necessary basic knowledge, lifeskills to improve social and economic well-being

description.narrative: All reached children, irrespective of gender, sustainably demonstrate the necessary basic knowledge, lifeskills to improve social and economic well-being

title.narrative: Number of children with enhanced knowledge, skills and attitude on SRHR and/or SEL

description.narrative: Children demonstrate knowledge related to basic literacy and numeracy, knowledge and behaviour related to SEL and CSE and Life skills and technical skills needed to find a suitable employment

title.narrative: The extent to which children demonstrate enhanced knowledge, skills and attitude on SRHR and/or SEL

description.narrative: Children demonstrate knowledge related to basic literacy and numeracy, knowledge and behaviour related to SEL and CSE and Life skills and technical skills needed to find a suitable employment

title.narrative: Number of children with improved learning outcomes

description.narrative: This indicator refers to the number of children that show improved learning outcomes on all subjects of the regular curriculum. This is measured by average grade of final exams. Learning outcomes on additional programs (e.g. CSE) are not measured by this indicator.

title.narrative: The extent to which children demonstrate improved learning outcomes

description.narrative: This indicator refers to the number of children that show improved learning outcomes on all subjects of the regular curriculum. This is measured by average grade of final exams. Learning outcomes on additional programs (e.g. CSE) are not measured by this indicator.

title.narrative: Children and youth are organised in school clubs and trained to jointly develop advocacy activities.

description.narrative: Children and youth are organised in school clubs and trained to jointly develop advocacy activities

title.narrative: Number of children and youth organised in school clubs

description.narrative: This indicator refers to the number of learners that participate(d) in the set-up and training of school clubs.

title.narrative: Children complete primary education

description.narrative: Children complete primary education

title.narrative: % of children that completed primary education

description.narrative: The percentage of children that completed primary education out of all children that were reached by primary education in an Edukans project. This indicator is an indication for the quality of education. In addition, drop-out could be estimated using the completion rates.

title.narrative: Children receive CSE in schools

description.narrative: Children receive CSE in schools

title.narrative: Number of children that participate in CSE programmes

description.narrative: Through making CSE materials available and training teachers and school community in gender responsive pedagogy and CSE, children from the age of 9 and up receive CSE, through making CSE materials available and training teachers and school community in CSE

title.narrative: Children receive quality (gender sensitive) education

description.narrative: Children receive quality (gender sensitive) education

title.narrative: Number of children educated

description.narrative: This indicator refers to the total number of children directly reached through basic education programmes of Edukans in order to get a general sense of the scope of Edukans' reach. Number of children that receive CSE are also measured by this number.

title.narrative: Civil society actors organized and trained on education rights and making school improvement plans and influencing government

description.narrative: Civil society actors organized and trained on education rights and making school improvement plans and influencing government

title.narrative: Number of civil society actors organised and trained

description.narrative: Edukans aims to strengthen local civil society in lobby and advocacy towards governmental and private sector decision makers. Lobby & Advocacy is needed to establish commitment for quality education and vocational training. Edukans helps partners to define the L&A messages in terms of specific educational needs and provides training in basic L&A skills.

title.narrative: Community representatives and parents trained

description.narrative: Community representatives and parents trained

title.narrative: Number of community representatives and parents trained

description.narrative: This indicator refers to the number of parents and community representatives (chiefs, assembly members etc.) that participate(d) in sensitization on the relevance of education and role of parents in education of their children

title.narrative: Curricula developed on Edukans methods (ATL, CSE, SEL, Life skills, GRP)

description.narrative: Curricula developed on Edukans methods (ATL, CSE, SEL, Life skills, GRP)

title.narrative: Number of curricula developed

description.narrative: This indicator refers to the number of curricula developed by Edukans on Active Teaching & Learning, Comprehensive Sexuality Education, Social & Emotional Learning, Lifeskills and/or Gender Responsive Pedagogy

title.narrative: Education providers deliver relevant and quality (vocational) education

description.narrative: Education providers deliver relevant and quality (vocational) education

title.narrative: Number of schools that deliver relevant and quality education

description.narrative: Education providers are supported in taking a responsibility in quality and relevance ensurance of their own educational institution. Quality and relevance standards are defined and can be measured using the EDU-Q Card and 'Skills-Q Cards' (under construction).

title.narrative: Number of TVETs that deliver relevant and quality vocational education

description.narrative: Education providers are supported in taking a responsibility in quality and relevance ensurance of their own educational institution. Quality and relevance standards are defined and can be measured using the EDU-Q Card and 'Skills-Q Cards' (under construction).

title.narrative: Government and educational authorities effectively support schools

description.narrative: Government and educational authorities effectively support schools

title.narrative: Number of government and educational authorities support schools

description.narrative: After the training we expect government officials and educational authorities to take up their role in safeguarding educational quality standards in their country or district. Education authorities include teacher educators of Colleges of Teacher Education.

title.narrative: Government officials and educational authorities trained

description.narrative: Government officials and educational authorities trained

title.narrative: Number of government officials and education authorities trained

description.narrative: This indicator refers to the number of government officials and education authorities (e.g. DEOs, CTEs, school inspection staff) that are trained in quality education standards and their role in safeguarding these standards in their country or district.

title.narrative: Learning environment upgraded

description.narrative: Learning environment upgraded

title.narrative: Number of schools upgraded

description.narrative: This indicator refers to: 1. The number of classrooms built, reconstructed and/or amended 2. The number of schools with improved learning materials 3. The number of schools with improved child protection measures in place

title.narrative: Materials available for Edukans methods (ATL, CSE, SEL, Life skills, GRP)

description.narrative: Materials available for Edukans methods (ATL, CSE, SEL, Life skills, GRP)

title.narrative: Number of materials developed

description.narrative: This indicator refers to the number of learning materials developed by Edukans for Active Teaching & Learning, Comprehensive Sexuality Education, Social & Emotional Learning, Lifeskills and/or Gender Responsive Pedagogy

title.narrative: Number of STAR schools involved

description.narrative: Number of STAR schools involved

title.narrative: Number of TTC's involved

description.narrative: This indicator refers to the number of TTC's that improve their education to future teachers through trainings of Edukans, in order to get a general sense of the scope of Edukans' reach (e.g. for upscaling).

title.narrative: Number of STAR schools involved

description.narrative: This indicator refers to the number of basic education schools (primary and secondary education) that conduct EDU-Q Card assessment and make a school development plan based on scores (so called STAR schools). As Edukans uses the EDU-Q Card methodology in all basic education school we work with, this number is equal to the total number of basic education schools in the scope of Edukans' reach.

title.narrative: Parent Teacher Associations promote (girls) education in the community

description.narrative: Parent Teacher Associations promote (girls) education in the community

title.narrative: Number of PTA's that promote education

description.narrative: Parents teachers associations (as a group) actively promote education in communities and stimulate parents and caregivers to take an interest in the education of their children and support children (financially)

title.narrative: Parents and community representatives engage in school policies and practices

description.narrative: Parents and community representatives engage in school policies and practices

title.narrative: Number of parents and community representatives that engage in school policies and practices

description.narrative: Edukans aims to strengthen local civil society (e.g. community groups like PTA's and SMC's, community groups) in lobby and advocacy towards governmental and private sector decision makers. With the acquired L&A skills civil society actors can advocate for quality education and access to education with (local) government and education authorities

title.narrative: School leaders effectively apply leadership and management skills

description.narrative: School leaders effectively apply leadership and management skills

title.narrative: Number of school leaders effectively apply leadership and management skills

description.narrative: School management is supporting in conducting the quality safeguarding role in their schools. After the training we expect school leaders to effectively take this role.

title.narrative: School leaders trained in leadership and management skills

description.narrative: School leaders trained in leadership and management skills

title.narrative: Number of school leaders trained

description.narrative: School leaders who completed the training in leadership and management skills

comment.narrative: Three time training by YCDA, Comenius and World teachers organised structured training for Head maaster and president SMCs.

title.narrative: Sustainable livelihoods and active citizenship through development of knowledge, skills and attitudes of marginalized children and youth

description.narrative: Sustainable livelihoods and active citizenship through development of knowledge, skills and attitudes of marginalized children and youth

title.narrative: % of all children reached that have a sustainable livelihood and demonstrate active citizenship

description.narrative: Edukans wants children to develop a sustainable livelihood and become active citizens. This is achieved through quality basic and secondary education. With the educational background children are empowered to successfully participate in society, both economically and socially. This indicator measures the percentage of all children reached by Edukans that have a sustainable livelihood and demonstrate active citizenship.

title.narrative: The extent to which all children and youth reached have a sustainable livelihood

description.narrative: Edukans wants marginalised youth to develop a sustainable livelihood and become active citizens. This is achieved through vocational (technical) training and in some cases Life skills training. The training helps youngsters to be professional in obtaining and keeping a job or start their own business and to successfully participate in society, both economically and socially. This indicator measures the percentage of all youth reached by Edukans that have a sustainable livelihood and demonstrate active citizenship.

title.narrative: Teachers apply proven and effective teaching methods and materials and use relevant curricula

description.narrative: Teachers apply proven and effective teaching methods and materials and use relevant curricula

title.narrative: Number of teachers applying newly acquired teaching methods effectively

description.narrative: Teachers are observed to use active learning and effective instruction methods in their lessons. In addition they are observed to apply specific teaching skills and appropriate methods for SEL and CSE and apply these skills in their classrooms. Also, they use the proposed curricula from Edukans.

title.narrative: Teachers trained in Edukans methods (ATL, CSE, SEL, Life skills, GRP)

description.narrative: Teachers trained in Edukans methods (ATL, CSE, SEL, Life skills, GRP)

title.narrative: Number of teachers trained

description.narrative: This indicator refers to the number of teachers that completed one or more Edukans training(s) on Active Teaching & Learning, Comprehensive Sexuality Education, Social & Emotional Learning, Lifeskills and/or Gender Responsive Pedagogy

comment.narrative: This includs training on Class room transaction and CSE by YCDA and world teachert and comenius.

comment.narrative: 1180 in school (standard 6, 7 and 8) 1.146 adolescents out of school 6 months value end target is 4111 3534 children in schools and 577 out of school
